sense.gloss: charge, duty, person in charge, official, clerk

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なん↓でうまくいかないか↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑説明↑↓せつめい↓するにはずいぶん↑時間↑↓じかん↓が|かかり|そうだ。
sdata.e: It would take me too much time to explain to you why it's not going to work.
